column1: # Adds a tsv alarm database for transistions alarm
# No. : Alarm numner. Also adds priority. If two alarms are in run mode, lower number dictates what profile is to be run
# DOW : Day of Week to run alarm. 0 == Monday. Can be comma seperated(1,2,3) or with dash (1-5)
# Ready_T : When to go to READY from IDLE. Ready time preceeding run time will be used. This is for pre-snooze. Can be set same as Run_T
# Repeat : How many times to repeat alarm. Each READY state will decrement count. Set to zero for infinite repeat
# Adds a tsv alarm database for transistions alarm
